title: Leclerc fastest despite Stroll clash: Friday F1 practice at the 2025 Monaco GP
summary: Local hero and last year's winner Charles Leclerc topped both Friday practice sessions ahead of the 2025 Monaco Grand Prix

qa_pairs.question: Which driver topped both Friday practice sessions at the 2025 Monaco Grand Prix?
What notable event involved Charles Leclerc during the Friday practice sessions?
In which year did Charles Leclerc win the Monaco Grand Prix prior to the 2025 event?
